body.p: To his Excellency The Hon Beriah Magoffin Govenor of the Commonwealath of Kentucky,

Your petitioners would represent that at the Last JanDecember Term 1860 of the Scott Quarterly Court he was fined in the sum of $30 ^& cost^ for assault & Battery, That Your petitioner is a poor man, but industrious. that he has a large family to support. that his wife is sickley. and that if he is compelled to pay the fine he will be very much oppressed, & that his familiy will necessarily suffer for the necessaries of life. wherefore he humbly petitions Your Excellency for a remission of the fine,

The undersigned write in the foregoing petition for a remission of
the fine agaisnt said Jacob Stokley,

Bat T Thompson P J
George W offutt (old Friend)
James W Samuell
E. F. Cantrill
B. F. Williams
J. W. Risk, D, S,
P Rankins

Genl Johnson we send you a petition to the Governor for the remission of a fine gainst Mr Stokly which you will please use your Influence in having it remitted the Governors Message takes well here with our frends

Scott Cir. Ct
$30 } assault
J. Stokeley
Issd Jany 22d 1861
